website_summaries.verdict: This is a great, inexpensive beginner's racket for kids 10 and under who are interested in trying out the sport.
pros: Available in several sizes to suit children of different ages
Lightweight and small enough for kids to hold comfortably
cons: Some say the racket feels too light and like it could break

customer_reviews.title: Great First Kid's Racquet; Recommend Ordering a Replacement Grip
customer_reviews.text: Great first racquet for kids. For my eight year old daughter, I purchased the 25". It says that size is for 9-10 year olds, but my child is tall and I figured she will grow into it. The racquet didn't seem too large at all. It gave her confidence on the court and made her feel like a tennis star. I would suggest ordering a replacement grip because after a week of use it was filthy and lost it's "gripiness."
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there
customer_reviews.text: Perfect racquet for my 7 year old. Great price which is why I wasn't that shocked when I saw 8 of the 10 kids in his tennis class have this exact same racquet. All the parents looked at each other in the stands and nodded...yes Amazon...yes good price. Classic. The product is lightweight, and durable. Scuffed up on the top due to my son dragging it everywhere, but that is just paint. Highly recommended. 8 out of 10 parents agree...
customer_reviews.author: sc_parent

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the $$. I bought them for my kids to use at tennis lessons and to practice. I should get a couple of years out of them. We have a smaller model of these, which the kids had for two years. The larger sizes are good for adults picking up the game for the first time. Amazon had them for less than Target and Dick's Sporting Goods.
customer_reviews.author: Bunson Honeydew

customer_reviews.title: Great starter racquet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a starter racquet for my 9-yr old who is just learning to play. Didn't want to put a lot of money out for a beginner racquet, but wanted a good one so that he isn't hampered by poor equipment. When we received this one, we were very pleased with the choice. It does not appear that we gave up quality for the less expensive option. It's lightweight and nice to hit with. It arrived promptly in excellent condition. An excellent buy all around.
customer_reviews.author: P. S. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner tennis racket for kids
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner tennis racket for kids. I'd say this racket should work up to age 6-7. It's light and has a short grip so it's easier for little wrists to maneuver. I noticed many of the kids in my daughters tennis clinic had the same racket, came to find out the tennis pro shop was actually recommending this exact racket to all beginners in her age group. We looked around at several different stores and this was the best racket for the price that we found.
customer_reviews.author: Makileau

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner's racquet
customer_reviews.text: My son started lessons this year and looking at all the other racquets, this one seemed the best size for the money. He is basically starting out, but he can hold the racquet up and swing without problems. He is small for his age, 10y/o, but 50 inches and 50 pounds. He has no difficulty using it and he is actually better with backhand than forehand. Like my racquets, I added a tacky grip and cheap vibration dampener for better control. However, the rest of the racquet is perfect for his size and learning level.
customer_reviews.author: The Judge

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet for a beginning player
customer_reviews.text: This racquet is perfect for a beginner. My 7 year old son plays with this racquet, and he loves it. It's the perfect size and weight for him. He's on the smaller side, but this racquet fits him perfectly. He loves playing with it. The grip is decent quality and the perfect size. He's able to hold on to the racquet and hit ball without the grip slipping. The racquet comes ready to go, strings and all. All you need are some balls and a court, and you're good to play!
customer_reviews.author: Janeee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6yr-old daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr-old daughter recently expressed an interest in trying out tennis so we signed her up for classes and began to hunt for the perfect racket. I chose this one based on the price, color, and overall positive reviews. My daughter was so excited when it arrived and she saw the bright fuchsia pink color! The zip-up cover that comes with this racket is also a nice bonus. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: 19” still too big but great buy👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my one year old granddaughter for Christmas. She stands up against the couch while we practice forehands and backhands, overheads and volleys. She thinks it’s funny and the muscle memory has already started🎾 The video shows you just how little she is and likes to push legos around.
customer_reviews.author: Sue bee

customer_reviews.title: bought 2 - blue and pink for both son and daugther
customer_reviews.text: My kids are start playing tennis at their schools. Those racket are very affordable and fit our budget. Kids have been playing with this racket for 3 session already. So far they didn't say anything and the racket still in good condition. A little complain is that they're a little heavier compare to each other. The pink version is a little lighter compare to the blue version. It's very interested in differences because it's in the same brand
customer_reviews.author: AZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: great racket and be careful for who seller is
customer_reviews.text: This racket is great however one lesson I learned was to pay attention to who the seller is. I bought another Wilson racket from amazon however it was mysteriously sold by a different seller which I believed the item was not even genuine. This one however I got from amazon.com which turned out to be a lot better in quality. Stuff itself is great but pay attention to the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Waston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves tennis. This racket fits her perfectly. Thanks amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tiny racket
customer_reviews.text: I know it says for juniors and my son is 11 years old but this racket is really designed for a 5-7 year old (in my opinion). There’s only enough room for one hand on the handle and it is definitely smaller (hence the junior). Wether it’s for a beginner or not, I have no clue. But it is small.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L.

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, terrific, gorgeous, incredible! Thanks to this racket I dominate the Davis cup. There was no story for the others. Impressive tool, as powerful as a 50mm, as light as a baby wind. Love it
customer_reviews.author: valerio

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality tennis rackets for children to learn to play tennis . They are light and comfortable to hold . Happy with purchase .
customer_reviews.author: AMZLH

customer_reviews.title: Weird Head Shape Not in Symmetry Slightly
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Xmas gift for my 8-Y-O daughter. I'm not a picky buyer, but since it supposed to be the 1st decent racket for her to the upcoming tournament in Feb, I'd say I was a little disappointed with the weird head shape. The delivery was on time just ahead of the Xmas day. I had no time to regret, otherwise I'd return it for sure. Fortunately, pink is my daughter's favorite, so far in peace, and already use it for couple hits. She doesn't feel bad honestly.
customer_reviews.author: XD

customer_reviews.title: 19” racket Great for My 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect starter racket for my 4 year old. He has used with the red and yellow youth balls and now the orange dot balls. He practices his serve with the foam balls as he learns to maneuver the racket. It’s withheld a few times he’s banged it on the court. Ouch! But he’s learning and now knows he can’t use it as a shovel. I would recommend for small children.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lilo

customer_reviews.title: Best for recreational and beginner tennis
customer_reviews.text: These are the best racquets for junior recreational players. The prices of them vary widely throughout the year as inventory goes up and down.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The product is of adequate price -- but as others have mentioned, the product is a youth style racquet. It works as intended but if you are serious about tennis as a hobby or sport, it may be better to just spring for the full-sized adult racquets, even for your youth because they will end up growing into it anyway (the difference between what I bought and adult size is a mere 2 inches)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Sooo cute. Absolutely perfect for my 9 year old child.
customer_reviews.author: ron hubbard jr

customer_reviews.title: Good kid’s starter racquet
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and I loved the price. We only played a few matches but should last for the couple years it will fit him for the amount we play.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: My favorite book ever!
customer_reviews.text: This review is from my 10 year old daughter: This is my favorite book ever. I read a lot of books, especially in the fantasy genre and my favorite authors are Tamora Pierce and Tui T. Sutherland. I liked this book because it was fast paced and held my interest. I liked how the author incorporated fairy tales and showed how characters such as Cinderella started out. I also liked how the story is told from two different perspectives, one from a good character (Agatha) and one from an evil character (Sophie). Sophie thinks she is good and she is pretty but she is vain and doesn't see how she is not so nice.
customer_reviews.author: Waiting for Inspiration

customer_reviews.title: Not completly strung
customer_reviews.text: didn't even notice until we got to the court, but the racket was not completely strung. you can see in the picts a string was too short, and this got past a quality control person/machine?? I am returning because even if I keep it, it will fail in no time. will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Bynum

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5yo
customer_reviews.text: I got this racket for my 5 year old. It is very lightweight. We play racquetball in a racquetball room and it works perfectly! We had issues with making due with racquets in the past, but he kept breaking the other racquets (I am talking like paddleboards). This one works well and is not very loud when hitting the ball! I recommend this racquet - it is inexpensive, lightweight and gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: forkfairy

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful racquet for beginners! My 4.5 year old son loves it and was making better contact and got the foam ball over the net more times than he has since he started playing 4 months ago. The colors are perfect for a little boy, or even for just gender neutral colors. Much better than one I had originally ordered online which was hot pink and purple. Those were not very gender neutral...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Great racket! Got 2!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome racket. I have a beginning player; 9 years old. She’s pretty small, so I got a 23. Also bought one for a little 6 year old; size 21. The tennis instructor commented on what nice rackets the girls had! Great price too! It comes with a nice bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Good for kid beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. As beginner. 9 yrs last year. He still use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first racket
customer_reviews.text: Perfect racket for first time players. I appreciated its durability considering how hard my 7 year old plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Tennis Racket For New Young Player
customer_reviews.text: This racket was purchased for our 9 year old grandson. He is learning to play tennis! The chart helped us determine the correct size for him, since he is quite tall. He loves using this wellmade racket!
customer_reviews.author: Sherlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade for a smallish 5 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: It was time to finally upgrade from her starter tennis racquet and of course, she picked pink! Since she's growing (still small - maybe 50-60th percentile?) she needed to upgrade from her beloved Hello Kitty racquet. This has been great and she's continuing to work on her form. To her, it feels like a real racquet, not a toy, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kaizoku!

customer_reviews.title: Great starter raquet
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids are enjoying taking tennis lessons with these raquets...and foam balls for beginners
customer_reviews.author: WAM

customer_reviews.title: Her BOOM STICK!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my 5 year old. She loves the color and I love the power on this racket. Great balance and control.
customer_reviews.author: The ELITE

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT! for my small hands..its light weight and the handle is easy to hold on to..Its on the short side in length which is what I wanted as well
customer_reviews.author: sewbiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the young ones!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 2.5 year old son. He's about 40" tall, and quickly growing. So this was marked suggested for 5-6 year olds, but he has no issue with it. I love that the colors are very neutral and it looks "professional". He's just playing for fun, of course, but having something fit to his size vs. swinging around something too big/heavy was important for us. He is a happy kid, so this is a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper M

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected. Love it! Not a flaw on it!
customer_reviews.text: Use this for casual tennis with my 11 year old. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sloan greer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 10 year old son. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these, and I sneak a shot, too
customer_reviews.text: These are phenomenal for kids, given the price. I have some old-school racquets/rackets/how do you spell that for myself, and I find myself picking up one of these when the kids go for a water break. If you're looking to see how your kids dig into tennis & you're not a former pro or purist, give them a shot.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this racquet. She’s been using it for a few weeks now & it’s working out well for her. It’s light, sturdy, rich colors, & has a nice little storage bag that helps keep it from getting dirty or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Quenga

customer_reviews.title: Not just for tennis
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these for my daughter to play badminton with because the others would always break. These are super light and are great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 9 year old son. He used it for tennis camp and has continued to use it since!
customer_reviews.author: Cino

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good price for a very good racket. My daughter’s teacher says it is perfect for her - she’s 7 y and 53’ tall - and she could use until 12 years old. Very good
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my GSD
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hit whistle balls for my dog to chase. The handle is short enough that is sends the ball just above my GSD's jumping range, yet close enough for him to hear the whistle of the ball as it passes over him
customer_reviews.author: Bobcat

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 7-year-old son who just started tennis lessons ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7-year-old son who just started tennis lessons. He likes it and said it's the right weight and size for him. He's 53 inches tall and weights about 59 pounds, not quite a athletic build but likes to play sports. His coach recommends a 23" racquet for his age and size.
customer_reviews.author: X. Meng

customer_reviews.title: great price for a great racket
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for my 8 year old boys who were showing interest in tennis. My racket handle was a bit large for them. They can grip these perfectly. The rackets are lightweight and strung very tightly. They are perfect for children getting into the game. I feel these will see use for many years to come
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 4 year old tennis starter!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 years old used it for the first time this week when we went to the court and he was hitting it back to me regularly on the first day. He's excited - great size for him to learn hand- eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerJ

customer_reviews.title: Kids racket
customer_reviews.text: This is more for kids not adults but as a beginner and just wanting to hit a ball it works out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mirna Eads

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 7 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this racket. The pink is great, and it's the perfect size and weight for her.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This racquet is perfect for my daughter who has attended a few sessions of tennis camp this summer. She is almost 9 and is a beginner. She really likes the racquet.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Carr

customer_reviews.title: Very good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: My son is so happy with this racket. I bought it for my 7 yo son at his 2nd year of tennis. Value for money and very good racket for beginner. Delivery was so fast, much faster than the estimated day. It came with bubble wrap and box (no head cover).
customer_reviews.author: Ayu

customer_reviews.title: lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Pretty racket, comes with a light case to zip around the head. Too lightweight for heavy hitting. Bought the foam balls for swing practice ... they're a heavy-duty foam, a little larger than normal balls. Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: SUPER buy
customer_reviews.text: It is super light and sturdy, and it works super good. now my 6 years old daughter love her racquet so so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: My child needed a tennis racquet to play for casual practice. This is a perfect size of 25" racquet for an eight to ten-year-old. The strings are strong and bounce tennis balls well. The color is long-lasting and doesn't wear if you take care of the item and store this in a box not exposed to sun or rain due to careless manners. Other than that, this works well.
customer_reviews.author: Super Star

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a new racket and this one fit the bill. It appears to work as a tennis racket should. Seems well built and will definitely last as long as she needs it.
customer_reviews.author: ECS

customer_reviews.title: Two year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our 2 year old loves this. Great size for him to grow into but also works fine for him now.
customer_reviews.author: Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner tennis racket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and it is lightweight and a great beginner tennis racket. Good quality and overall suited for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Jrs
customer_reviews.text: Nice racket for the money. It dents very easily though. Got it as an Easter gift for my son. He’s used it every day since.
customer_reviews.author: Deandra R Bosqui

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed it came damaged and wasn’t checked over better before shipping. I don’t see how it could have been damaged in the package like that. I would return it but since this is my 2nd one (as the other was girl colors) I don’t have time to return it and wait for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: That i always received my stuff on time
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much it's not to heavy i buy it for my son to practice tennis at school and he love it. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Janine Hunte

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my10 year old granddaughter and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Cachil

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: My kid like it , that we can play tennis game together
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 8 yr old daughter - she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great racket for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great racket for the money. Bought this for my child's first time playing tennis. Didn't want to spend a ton given she's a beginner and will be outgrowing this in a year or two max. Good basic racket and definitely serves our needs. I don't know that much about rackets, but I'd recognize if this was cheaply made and/or of poor quality - which it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: A. Verma

customer_reviews.title: Good racket
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently started tennis training. She is comfortable with it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: BO CEN

customer_reviews.title: Weight
customer_reviews.text: It is good. The weight is a little bit too light
customer_reviews.author: Sue Miao

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i love that this raquet is light and wide. i is good for beginers. i think it was a bit more pricy than the other options
customer_reviews.author: nessrine

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit for my almost-seven-year-old. He loves it. It’s a perfect racket for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: doyouhearwhatihear

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and the right size
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best rackets from Wilson for toddlers. It was the right size for our 4 year old and I'm sure it will last long. They are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 yo who just started tennis. It is perfect for a beginning player.
customer_reviews.author: geographyfan

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner racket
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner racket!! My 7 year old uses this for lessons and loves it! Holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: SMP

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 4yr old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 4yr old daughter. Wilson's sizing chart might be a bit on the small side. I selected this size based upon internet recommendations and this worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 8 year old. Holds up well and she uses it several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: tennis weapon
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old. Perfect size for him. Also doubles as an awesome air guitar and, in a pinch, as a weapon to threaten his little brother.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Kake

customer_reviews.title: Good for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter she likes it. The grip is also good
customer_reviews.author: nabu08

customer_reviews.title: Works for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2-year old, and she loves it! Was worried it would be too big, and she was too young, but it's a great starter racket and she is psyched to play like mommy!
customer_reviews.author: Eden Gudonis

customer_reviews.title: Good racket for a small child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small 6-7 year old. It's perfect. He's a beginner, but quite good. Keep in mind the grip is quite short--it is meant for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Heard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is a first timer at tennis. Super cute color (pink), light & easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Loving Wife & Mommy of Two

customer_reviews.title: Good Raquet, But Color is Slightly Different
customer_reviews.text: This product appears to be a purplish-pink, but it is a true bright pink. Good raquet, but the color advertised it a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: LSK

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight. Descent quality
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo loves it. She’s easily able to use it. Super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Ka’uhane

customer_reviews.title: Great racket for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: 19" is perfect for my nearly 3-year-old daughter, who can swing it with ease. Durable and lightweight.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for 6&7 year old girl
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 6 year old. Turning seven in a month and will be able to use for at least another year

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7yo who took tennis lessons for the first time this summer.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is great with everything it offers. This arrived fast and is perfect for the age range specified.

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 and 8yo daughters love them, fits their normal size hands well, great for novice adults also.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Good racket
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis racket for our daughter. 7 years old and just started tennis lessons. I would definitely recommend this. She loves the color also.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan F.

customer_reviews.title: If you like a nice tennis racket for a 2 to 4 year old this is a way to go
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tennis racket beautiful pink I recommended for ages 2 to 4 not 8 years old
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Racket!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old granddaugher and she loves it! It is the right size and she loves the pink color!
customer_reviews.author: JR MAYHUGH JR

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for his age, they loved tennis practice now the weather is getting nicer, solid racket and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Fits 8 year old well
customer_reviews.text: Santa got these for the kids for Christmas and they love them! They took them out a day or two after Christmas and had a blast. I for this size for my 8 year old daughter and the smaller size for my 6 year old son. The sizes work really well for them, they are average size kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Great starter racquet
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use; great starter racquet for my 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated customer

customer_reviews.title: Great racket for the value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old daughter who is about 4'3" for introductory tennis lessons. She likes the racquet and it is perfect for her level. In addition it can take the nicks and bangs that invariably happen when an 8 year old swings a racket for the first time. This racket is just as functional as a $100 junior racket for a beginner player.
customer_reviews.author: Blake S Hennon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great racket!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Great quality and perfect for my seven year old!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good racquet
customer_reviews.text: Nice racquet - is perfect size for my 6yo and seems well-constructed and durable. Good price point for a kids racquet.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little racket
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old daughter loves using this! Good size, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Fegan

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: I just started playing tennis and this has been a great rack for me! It’s very light weight and great for beginners
customer_reviews.author: LEM

customer_reviews.title: Great kids racquet
customer_reviews.text: Nice beginner racquet for our 3 year old. He's wanted to play tennis since seeing mommy and daddy's racquets in the cupboard. Can't wait for spring to get out on the court and spread the joy of tennis!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline gomersall

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for petite 7 year old girl & when she ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for petite 7 year old girl & when she got to her first class she was told it was too small. Had to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis racquet
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 5 years old and this is the right size for him. He started Tiny tennis classes this year.
customer_reviews.author: Marina K.

customer_reviews.title: Great racquet
customer_reviews.text: 10 yr old daughter loves this. She is a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter likes to watch me play paddle tennis so I got her this and the mushy kid balls so she can hit with me occasionally. She just turned three and will play for about five minutes at a stretch. Really nice to have a racket that's light enough for her to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: This one is what I am looking for, for my 8 years tennis beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wilson US Open Junior Tennis Racquet
product_meta.description: Wilson is the Official Ball of the US Open and partner of the USTA. The US Open 19 inch Junior Tennis Racket is approved for 10 and Under Tennis and is extremely lightweight and easy to swing.
feature_bullets: Approved for tennis players 10 and under
